message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
I'll give you 40% and keep 60%, it's a good deal!
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. What do you think, Bob?
I'll give you 45% this time, it's a fair split!
I'm getting desperate, Bob. I need a better deal to make up for inflation. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'll give you a bit less, but I'm still getting the better deal!
I'm getting close to the edge, Bob. I need a deal now. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'll take a smaller share now, but I'm not giving up yet!
